title: osinpay
author: osinpay
created_time: November 02, 2023, 06:16:09 PMLast edit: December 06, 2023, 12:03:48 AM by osinpay
content: INTRODUCTIONTrade without waiting and No more Heart BeatingHighlighting the challenges faced by novice traders and investors who rely on their analysis, Osinpay recognizes the significance of the issues related to waiting for a condition to materialize. As they say, "In the moment, FOMO takes over, and it often feels like the party's over." This happens when one fails to execute their strategy or lacks confidence in their research. Novice traders and investors may find it challenging to pinpoint the right moment based on their analysis. Osin offers a solution: the ability to trade without waiting, removing the emotional rollercoaster from the trading experience.TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONSAlgorithm:   GhostRiderBlock Time:   150 SecondsBlock Reward:   3,000 OSNExchange Ticker Symbol:   OSNSmartnode Collateral: 800,000MAX SUPPLY 21,000,000,000 OSNStart Smartnode block: 5671COIN DISTRIBUTIONSmartnode: 58%Miner: 28%Developer: 14%LINKSWebsite: https://osinpay.comRoadmap: https://osinpay.com#roadmapGithub: https://github.com/deosin/osinDiscord: https://discord.gg/UaD96UwGWCTwitter: https://twitter.com/osincoinExplorer: https://osinpay.net/Whitepaper: https://osinpay.com/whitepaper.pdfUbubtu 20 Wallet: https://github.com/deosin/osin/releases/download/1.38.19.84/osin-ubuntu20-1.38.19.84.tar.gzWindows Wallet: https://github.com/deosin/osin/releases/download/1.38.19.84/osin-win-1.38.19.84.zipVISION / GOALLaunching OSINPAY is like unlocking the gateway to a world of Decentralize finance and blockchain technology. Osinpay will serve as a hub for enthusiasts, investors, miners, and traders as a like-minded community to stay updated, access in-depth analyses, and explore new investment opportunities. As we embark on this journey, we're excited to provide a user friendly and informative space for individuals looking to navigate the exciting and dynamic landscape of cryptocurrencies, making it easier for them to dive into this ever evolving digital realm. Stay tuned for an abundance of resources, real-time market insights, and a supportive crypto community as our venture into this exciting new chapter of Auto Trade without waiting and No more Heart Beating.Our great hope to take osin as a long-term investment as a form of support to keep this project running and growing bigger. The journey is so far, but "The only journey is the one within".

comments.author: scorpio18
comments.body: https://pool.coin-miners.info/site/gomining?algo=gr OsinPay has been added to CoinMiners Mining PoolFee: 0.5%Payouts are made automatically every 1 hour for all balances above 0.01, or 0.001 on Sunday.Stratum settings:EU:Code: xmrig.exe -a gr -o stratum+tcp://eu.coin-miners.info:6518 -u WALLET_ADDRESS.WORKER_NAME -p xCode: wildrig.exe -a gr -o stratum+tcp://eu.coin-miners.info:6518 -u WALLET_ADDRESS.WORKER_NAME -p xCode: SRBMiner-MULTI.exe --algorithm ghostrider --pool eu.coin-miners.info:6518 --wallet WALLET_ADDRESS --password xUS:Code: xmrig.exe -a gr -o stratum+tcp://na.coin-miners.info:6518 -u WALLET_ADDRESS.WORKER_NAME -p xCode: wildrig.exe -a gr -o stratum+tcp://na.coin-miners.info:6518 -u WALLET_ADDRESS.WORKER_NAME -p xCode: SRBMiner-MULTI.exe --algorithm ghostrider --pool na.coin-miners.info:6518 --wallet WALLET_ADDRESS --password xIf you want to mine solo add m=solo to the password like this Code:-p m=soloDiscord channel https://discord.gg/szzvMEBNje

comments.author: crackfoo
comments.body: Hi, We've added OsinPay (OSN) to http://zpool.ca/algo/ghostrider. See below for connection details.Fee only: 1% or lessBTC payouts are processed once a day for balances above 0.0015Payouts for all other currencies are made automatically every 4 hours for balances above 0.05 and balances more than 0.0125 are included in one of the payouts each day.- Sample configurations -To mine ghostrider and get paid in OSN:Code:-a ghostrider -o stratum+tcp://ghostrider.mine.zpool.ca:5354 -u OSN_ADDRESS -p c=OSN Exchange to BTC:Code:-a ghostrider -o stratum+tcp://ghostrider.mine.zpool.ca:5354 -u BTC_ADDRESS -p c=BTCAll of our ports are NiceHash friendly, no need to specify any extra detailsSSL/TLS is available for all ports. Simply prepend the port with a 5. Example for ghostrider: 55354==============================Support: https://discord.gg/n45n6Jj Twitter: https://twitter.com/_zpool_

comments.author: The Sceptical Chymist
comments.body: The website for this is the most loaded diaper I've ever seen, and I've seen a-plenty.Uh, yeah.  I have an easy solution to that psychological problem.  Just step away from whatever screen you're using to look at the market when it's going crazy, take a breather, take a dump, whatever.  Come back when calm.  I didn't bother to see what "data-backed recommendations" you're providing, but your coin is a whole lot of bloated nothing.

comments.body: Vrc is the best staking platform ever

comments.author: osinpay
comments.body: Quote from: The Sceptical Chymist on November 26, 2023, 03:43:02 AMThe website for this is the most loaded diaper I've ever seen, and I've seen a-plenty.https://www.talkimg.com/images/2023/11/26/NXCkI.pngUh, yeah.  I have an easy solution to that psychological problem.  Just step away from whatever screen you're using to look at the market when it's going crazy, take a breather, take a dump, whatever.  Come back when calm.  I didn't bother to see what "data-backed recommendations" you're providing, but your coin is a whole lot of bloated nothing.Thank you for taking the time to go through my whitepaper. I appreciate your engagement with the content. I want to emphasize the significance of not closing the screen hastily, as doing so may result in missing valuable opportunities when specific conditions arise. The data I've presented serves as a range of parameters, offering Osin coin owners flexibility to trade based on their preferences. While Osin coin may appear inflated to some, it's crucial to recognize its fundamental algorithm as a Proof of Work (POW) coin. I believe it's important for discussions to reflect thoughtful perspectives, considering the ongoing progress of our work.
